Thanks

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://wordpress.com/post/johnjronline.wordpress.com/88546](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwordpress.com%2Fpost%2Fjohnjronline.wordpress.com%2F88546) ### Comment Username: @goodjohnjr > There is a chance that AdGuard DNS's default AdGuard DNS filter is possibly causing an issue on WordPress.com when it blocks pixel.wp.com, where when you are editing a post, the image block when set to a hotlinked image, shrinks very small. > > At first, I thought that it was just a WordPress.com glitch, which has been happening for almost two weeks on almost all my posts, but it went away after I refreshed the page when I switched from AdGuard DNS to Quad9 when I was trying to figure out if Adguard For Windows or Adguard VPN or Adguard DNS was causing the problem; though this was just one quick test, so I am not sure if it will last. > > Anyway, I just wanted to ### Screenshots

issue.title: google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://www.google.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com) ### Comment > Приложение ведёт себя так, будто другие приложения не раб. Совсем. Адгуард фильтрует только те приложения, в которые я захожу. И то не всегда фильтрует в одном приложении всегда отслеживание. Есть в скриншотах журнал фильтрации, где указано блокировка отслеживания в приложении Radio Player. То есть снанала, адгуард заблокировал его отслеживание, а потом уже нет. Помимо этого, я включил ECH, так как советовали авторы ваших статей на вашем сайте. Там шла речь, о стабильной версии Адгуард и что в скрытых настройках вашего приложения есть функции где можно включить есн, doh, чтобы теперь не только браузер но и приложения использовали ECH. ### Screenshots

Możesz dodać te reguły:

e-zikoapteka.pl##.banner-link

e-zikoapteka.pl##.background_banner
```
do reguł użytkownika.

issue.title: epoznan.pl
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://epoznan.pl](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fepoznan.pl) ### Comment Username: @mackowiakw > General Conent Blocker is making websites unscrollable. The problem is caused by removing the policy popup thus it's impossible to click 'Accept'. To be more specific, AdGuard doesn't remove it at all but lefts the invisible layer that covers document body, causing the problem. The problem can be observed on every site which uses Consent Framework by Sirdata (https://www.consentframework.com), eg. https://synonimy.pl ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/qadygPW.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/o599QLI.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard/AdGuard Pro for iOS v4.4.5(990) Browser: | Safari DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

comment.body:
I can reproduce only with disabled block: `||choices.consentframework.com^`

So I rethink about delete this from "Polish Cookies-GDPR":

`pl###sd-cmp:not(body):not(html)`

Due add `html:not([class*="sd-cmp-"]) ` needed will by only on pages with loaded choices script from random domain/cdn.

comment.body:
CSS 2.1:

```adb
! mostly top (but resize rest 5 a little): 
myabandonware.com##div[align="center"]

! left column (optional, too much move in left):
myabandonware.com##.box div:not([id]):not([class])

! sidebar:
myabandonware.com##.menu:not([class*=" "])
! or
myabandonware.com##div[class="menu"]
```


Fallback (Still CSS 2.1):

```adb
! it's center table instead move too much on left
myabandonware.com##.metas.box > div + div:style(margin: auto !important;)
```

comment.body:
Hi!
The issue is caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`. 
Please add `tiktok.com#@$#html { overflow-x: hidden !important; }` to User rules, or turn-off this filter. 
@yourduskquibbles Could you please take a look.

comment.body:
I can reproduce it only if I manually run anti-adblock script in console (`AdblockDetector.init()`).
This rule:
```adblock
filmku.stream###ad-block-detected-modal
```
should fixes it, but I'm not sure if it should be added, as it looks like that anti-adblock script is not enabled at the moment.

issue.title: epoznan.pl

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://epoznan.pl](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fepoznan.pl) ### Comment Username: @mackowiakw > General Conent Blocker is making websites unscrollable. The problem is caused by removing the policy popup thus it's impossible to click 'Accept'. To be more specific, AdGuard doesn't remove it at all but lefts the invisible layer that covers document body, causing the problem. The problem can be observed on every site which uses Consent Framework by Sirdata (https://www.consentframework.com), eg. https://synonimy.pl ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/qadygPW.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/o599QLI.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard/AdGuard Pro for iOS v4.4.5(990) Browser: | Safari DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

comment.body:
@mackowiakw I can't reproduce with AdGuard Base filter only, and with Base filter + AdGuard Annoyances.
Which filter exactly breaks the site?

issue.title: google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://www.google.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com) ### Comment > Приложение ведёт себя так, будто другие приложения не раб. Совсем. Адгуард фильтрует только те приложения, в которые я захожу. И то не всегда фильтрует в одном приложении всегда отслеживание. Есть в скриншотах журнал фильтрации, где указано блокировка отслеживания в приложении Radio Player. То есть снанала, адгуард заблокировал его отслеживание, а потом уже нет. Помимо этого, я включил ECH, так как советовали авторы ваших статей на вашем сайте. Там шла речь, о стабильной версии Адгуард и что в скрытых настройках вашего приложения есть функции где можно включить есн, doh, чтобы теперь не только браузер но и приложения использовали ECH. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/vo7anQ0.png)

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

Many websites

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

In Google search result with a Korean language query, there are some spam websites that its domain is changed frequently.


It seems that importing the following rules is best idea.

```adblock
/^https:\/\/[A-z0-9\.]*[A-z0-9]+\.[A-z]+\/\?u=[A-z0-9]{7}&o=[A-z0-9]{7}/$document
/^https:\/\/[A-z]+\.[A-z]+\.[A-z]+\/[A-z]+-robot\/\?pl=[A-z0-9-]{22}&sm=[A-z]+-robot&hash=[A-z0-9-]{22}&exp=[0-9]{10}/$document
/^https:\/\/[0-9]{9}\.[A-z0-9-]+\.[A-z]{2}\/[0-9]{6}\.html$/$document

Related issues:
 - https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/598
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/139667

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Hi. Cannot reproduce with your settengs. Please check what causes an issue - filters or stealth mode (disable one by one with checking)

i think it has something to do with dandelion sprout's annoyances list and easylist cookie list. i unchecked those two and it seems to be working. its also an intermittent failure to load, as i have also gotten the error again even without those two checked. i unchecked, then rechecked "i dont care about cookies" and that seemed to fix it. the error is popping up because the page is querying for cookies but the filter is blocking the cookies, which probably creates some sort of open feedback loop (im not a programmer, but its probably something in the same vein as how 10 cant be divided 3 times perfectly equally.)

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://epoznan.pl](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fepoznan.pl) ### Comment Username: @mackowiakw > General Conent Blocker is making websites unscrollable. The problem is caused by removing the policy popup thus it's impossible to click 'Accept'. To be more specific, AdGuard doesn't remove it at all but lefts the invisible layer that covers document body, causing the problem. The problem can be observed on every site which uses Consent Framework by Sirdata (https://www.consentframework.com), eg. https://synonimy.pl ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Hi!
The issue is caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist `. 
Please add 
`android-developers.googleblog.com#@$#.adb-header { position: relative !important; top: 0 !important; }` 
to the User rules, or turn off this filter. 
@yourduskquibbles Could you please take a look?

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Расширенный css не подходит?
`yenisafak.com#$?#.ys-headline-carousel-item:has(div.ys-headline-carousel-media > div.ys-link > a[href^="https://"][target="_blank"]) { remove: true; }`
